column5: As I kept casting away in the rain with almost nothing to show for it I started to wonder how I could be so entertained My end hypothesis - its what may be around the corner - the unexpected, the fluke and so on From fly ins to fishing off the dock in the Muskokas its a fishing memory post https://www.northernjacks.com/post/the-unexpected Cheers Andrew
Thanks Andrew and I'm sure it the lure of that one more cast that keeps us going as you never knowing what's down there waiting for it.
